name: Qirmiz: The Legend of Curly's Gold
name_original: Qirmiz: The Legend of Curly's Gold
description:
gamepad is recommended but keyboard input is supported

a/d or directional keys for horizontal movement

e/f to fire weapon

spacebar or enter to jump

Game renders best at full screen

LORE

On the edge of the galaxy Qirmiz sets out to battle a baddie.
